title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Digital-Based Physical Therapy Practical Skills Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply physical therapy practical skills with 80% or higher proficiency in blended learning environments.
Learners can self-directly complete two or more digital learning modules (videos/quizzes) per week via a flipped learning model.
Learners can achieve 90% proficiency in writing physical therapy data analysis reports through project-based assessments.
Learners can acquire three or more patient evaluation protocols using smartphone app-based simulation tools.
Learners can conduct five or more physical therapy case studies with peer learners via remote collaboration platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
